marketing_title: Victorian home in San Roque
marketing_description: Story book setting and Victorian charm with too many features to mention! Spacious living room with warm fireplace, dining room and sitting/family room on the first floor all with beautiful hardwood flooring, along with a tiled bathroom and laundry room. Second floor has two large bedrooms and an amazing bathroom with claw foot tub and double sinks.   Detached garage with two room studio above with powder room, vaulted ceilings and bamboo flooring. The grounds are all beautifully landscaped and the cobble stone drive and walkways make this stunning home a special haven.

amenities: New construction, 2-car garage attached, Central A/C, Soft-water system, High-ceilings, Washer/dryer included in laundry room
marketing_description: This townhouse has all of the features you are looking in a rental that are rarely found in this price range! This unit is new construction that was just built in the Los Carneros Village. Some upcoming attractive amenities with this HOA include a pool, playground, half basketball court, park and bike path. This floor plan is a dual-master suite design. This means two walk-in closets and high ceilings that let in lots of natural light with a total living space of 1491 sq. ft. The kitchen has beautiful quartz countertops with Whirlpool appliances, gas range and a single-basin sink. Other attractive features include: attached 2-car garage, central AC, solar (low electricity bill), laundry room with new Whirlpool washer/dryer, recessed lighting and many more!    Terms:  - One year Lease -   - Security deposit 5250  - Owner pays HOA fee  - Tenant utilities: Water/ Trash/ Electricity/ Gas/ Cable/Internet  - No smoking  - Small pet may be considered with additional deposit    Must have renter's insurance (approximately $15 - 25/month) with Mike Richardson Realtors as an additional insured and a minimum liability coverage of $100,000.     Please contact Christine at Christine@mrrealtors.com or call 805-965-4300 to schedule a showing. All applications are received online through our website at www.mrrealtors.com and we require an application for every individual over the age of 18.

marketing_title: Wonderful Town-Home downtown in the American Riviera!
marketing_description: Stylish and Sophisticated Downtown Townhome! Upon entering this welcoming 2 master en suite bedrooms/2.5 bathrooms townhome, you will feel yourself relax. Close enough to the excitement of downtown restaurants, shops, and entertainment venues, you will also enjoy the convenience of popular eateries – all located just steps away! Tucked at the back of an intimate 10-unit complex,    This beautiful end-unit town home features a remodeled kitchen including Caesarstone counters, high-end appliances, and tile back splash. The main living space boasts bamboo flooring, a fireplace in the living room, and a lovely patio located off the living room beyond the French doors creating a perfect setting for al fresco dining. The two large en suite bedrooms on the second story feature vaulted ceilings and lots of natural light. One bedroom also boasts an intimate deck for an extra get-away space and views of the mountains.    Both of the master bedroom closets feature custom California Closets built-ins. Additional features include an attached 1-car garage with built-in storage cabinets + 1 uncovered assigned space, private washer/dryer closet off the patio, and more custom California Closets built- ins in the first level closet.     Easy to show. Call Billy 805-570-4827 UNFURNISHED! NEW Paint and NEW carpet:)    AVAILABLE RIGHT AWAY IF DESIRED. MOVE IN DATES FLEXIBLE!

marketing_title: Brand New Two Bedroom, Two Bathroom Town House
amenities: In-Home Washer and Dryer, Off Street Parking, Dishwasher, Oven and Range, Fridge, Freezer, Microwave Oven, Tankless Water Heater, Communal BBQ Area
marketing_description: Urban and chic, these brand new, luxury town houses are located in the just completed Sycamore Creek Village development. These homes offer a full sized kitchen, living space, bedroom (or office space) and bathroom on the first floor and a master bedroom with full en suite bathroom on the second floor. Each unit also comes with its own private, in-home washer and dryer.    Vaulted ceilings create a spacious atmosphere in the kitchen and living space while large windows give bedrooms plenty of light. A crisp neutral palate and clean lines complete the fresh modern look.    Sycamore Creek Village is conveniently located on Santa Barbara's Lower East Side within walking distance to the beach, Montecito, Milpas shops, and biking distance to downtown.    All units come with individual appliances as standard (washer/drier, oven, fridge/freezer, range, microwave, tankless water heater, and dishwasher). No pets allowed.

marketing_title: Upper State Street Town Home
marketing_description: Rare opportunity to live in a peaceful San Roque neighborhood, 1 block from State Street. Walk to Restaurants, Shops and La Cumbre Plaza. Large, remodeled, 2 bedroom townhome with quiet charm in a great location in San Roque, Santa Barbara. A very spacious 2 bedroom apartment privately situated newly finished with a large kitchen, new appliances and an open plan, flowing out to a spacious private outside patio area. This 2 bedroom home is located in a charming, spacious and quiet complex with carport parking and beautiful grounds. A wonderful setting in a prime uptown location. Lots of light all windows and a large slider overlooking the private front grounds. A generous bath and high function kitchen complete the package. Oversized living room with charming finishes. A high efficiency electric range and new dishwasher add to the charm of this great 2 bedroom home. There is also access to a washer/dryer on site.
